citation.title: Pluto's Interaction with the Solar Wind

news.title: Pluto is more like a planet than we thought, new flyby data reveals
news.summary: It might have been demoted from planet to dwarf planet some 10 years ago, but Pluto has remained firmly in our hearts ever since.

news.title: The Latest Data on Pluto Shows Its More Planet-Like Than We Thought
news.summary: Pluto is one mysterious, confusing world, and the more we learn about it, the less astronomers know how to classify it.

news.title: Pluto: Planet, Dwarf Planet Or Comet, Scientists Reveal It Is Something Else
news.summary: 04:40 AM EDT Scientists are reportedly saying that Pluto is a hybrid between a planet and a comet.

news.title: Pluto's interactions with the solar wind are unique, study finds
news.summary: Home Astronomy & Space Space Exploration May 4, 2016 May 4, 2016 Pluto has some characteristics less like that of a comet and more like much larger planets, according to an analysis of Pluto's unique interaction with the solar wind, scientists say.

news.title: Pluto's Interaction with the Solar Wind is Unique, Study Finds
news.summary: Pluto has some characteristics less like that of a comet and more like much larger planets, according to the first analysis of Pluto's unique interaction with the solar wind, scientists say.

news.title: Il vento solare soffia su Plutone
news.summary: Una delle immagini mozzafiato raccolte a luglio scorso dalla sonda New Horizons della NASA durante il suo incontro ravvicinato con Plutone.

news.title: Pluto looks like a cross between a planet and a comet
news.summary: Although it has not been regarded a planet since 2006, Pluto continues to excite and surprise astronomers the more they learn about the dwarf planet.

news.title: Unique Pluto, solar wind interactions similar to those of large planets - Technology Org
news.summary: Pluto has some characteristics less like that of a comet and more like much larger planets, according to the first analysis of Pluto’s interaction with the ubiquitous space plasma known as solar wind.

news.title: Pluto's Atmosphere Interacts With Solar Wind In Unique Ways, Similar To Those Of Larger Planets
news.summary: A new study has revealed the unique way that Pluto's hazy atmosphere interacts with solar wind and suggests that Pluto is more like a planet than we think.

news.title: Pluto reconsidered: Is it a planet? A comet? Or something else altogether?
news.summary: The debate over Pluto’s status has maintained its vigor ever since the International Astronomical Union’s 2006 decision to downgrade it to a dwarf planet, with experts still at odds as to what its correct classification should be.

news.title: Pluto Is Looking More Like A Planet After All
news.summary: Seti | NASA | JHUAPL | SwRI Pluto may have recently been demoted to the status of dwarf planet, but as astronomers learn more about this distant body, they are learning it behaves more like a planet than once believed.

news.title: Pluto To Become A Planet Again? Scientists Take Hard Look At Reclassifying Pluto
news.summary: Will Pluto become a planet again? It turns out that experts are still flummoxed on what the downgraded planet’s correct classification should be.

news.title: Es Plutn un planeta o un planeta enano?
news.summary: D. Silva 09 de mayo del 2016 / 12:39 Hrs El debate sobre el estado de Plutón como planeta ha estado en conversación desde el 2006, cuando la Unión Astronómica Internacional decidió quitarle la categoría de planeta y rebautizarlo como "planeta enano".

news.title: Is Pluto a planet? New finding calls Pluto's status into question - Redorbit
news.summary: Space May 9, 2016 Those arguing for Pluto to be classified as a planet just got a stronger case as a new study found Pluto interacts with the stream of particles known as the solar wind more like a planet than a comet.

news.title: Is Pluto a planet? New finding calls Pluto's status into question - Redorbit
news.summary: Space May 9, 2016 Those arguing for Pluto to be classified as a planet just got a stronger case as a new study found Pluto interacts with the stream of particles known as the solar wind more like a planet than a comet.

news.title: Pluto s unique interaction with solar wind revealed
news.summary: Pluto behaves less like a comet than expected and somewhat more like a planet like Mars or Venus in its interaction with the solar wind - a continuous stream of charged particles from the Sun, a first ever analysis has revealed.

news.title: Plutón, el cometa.
news.summary: La nave New Horizons sigue revelando más misterios sobre Plutón. Ahora encontró que tiene una cola de iones ¡igual que los cometas! Una lluvia de protones y neutrones provenientes del Sol se desvían al acercarse a Plutón debido a la interacción con…

news.title: Plutone: un po’ cometa, un po’ pianeta - Galileo
news.summary: 17 maggio 2016 - - Stampa Il più lontano dei pianeti del Sistema solare interagisce in maniera unica con il vento solare deviandolo in maniera paragonabile a quanto si osserva intorno a Marte e Venere (Credits: NASA/JHUAPL/SwRI) Quasi dieci anni fa…

blogs.title: Thanks, Comet Pluto. Solar System Nomenclature Needs A Major Rethink
